meanings.sent1: The mischievous puppy beslimed the clean floor with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, the children beslimed their clothes.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef managed to beslime the entire kitchen with flour while baking a cake.
meanings.sent4: The rainstorm beslimed the streets, turning them into muddy rivers.
meanings.sent5: The naughty raccoon beslimed the picnic area with garbage, causing a mess.

meanings.sent1: The old well was beslimed with green algae, making it look eerie.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had windows beslimed with grime, giving it a spooky appearance.
meanings.sent3: The beslimed pond was home to many frogs, happily hopping around in the muck.
meanings.sent4: The beslimed walls of the cave glistened in the dim light, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The beslimed rocks along the shore were slippery, making it dangerous to walk on them.
